hypothesis_content.title: BTC 4H Bollinger Band Squeeze Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC enters a period of low volatility (Bollinger Band Width < 0.02) in a NEUTRAL regime, a 4-hour close outside the bands with volume > 150% of 20-period average will initiate a directional move that persists for at least 2% beyond the breakout level.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Bollinger Band squeezes represent compression of volatility, often preceding explosive moves. Volume confirmation filters false breakouts. NEUTRAL regimes provide optimal balance between trend potential and mean reversion risk.
entry_conditions: BTC 4H Bollinger Band Width (20,2) < 0.02 for 3 consecutive periods
4H candle closes above upper band (long) or below lower band (short)
Volume on breakout candle > 150% of 20-period average volume

exit_conditions.take_profit: 2.5% from entry price in breakout direction

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout fails to sustain >1% beyond bands within 4 periods, or price immediately reverses to opposite band.
